scripts.xfull-build: npm --prefix scraping run server && npm --prefix app run client-build
scripts.xfull-start: npm --prefix scraping run server && npm --prefix app run client-start
scripts.full-build: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm --prefix scraping run server" "cd .." "npm --prefix app run client-build"
scripts.full-start: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm --prefix scraping run server" "cd .." "npm --prefix app run client-start"
